Paragraph: Lenalidomide and dexamethasone ( RD ) is a standard of care for relapsed / refractory multiple myeloma ( RRMM ) , but there is limited published data on its efficacy and safety in the " real world " ( RW ) , according to the International Society of Pharmacoeconomics and Outcomes Research definition .
